extendedInfo.description: This application contains  more than 1000 Smiley emoji (japanese text emoticons - ascii art) divided into categories. You can import and share via all messaging applications that allow sharing of images (email, WhatsApp, Bluetooth, gMail, Messages (MMS), Facebook, G+, LINE, Skype, Viber, IM+, Hi5, etc.).The application has two distinct features.you can run it as a normal application, browse the categories, click the emoji and share it or you can start the application when you choose to share or attach a picture from any external applicationFor example in WhatsApp the procedure is:- Tap the paperclip icon in the upper right in this WhatsApp- Select Gallery- Select Share Emoji!!!- Select the emoji to share and click the hand button- Paste the emoji where you want!!!For this specific case the procedure is also shown in the screenshotsWith this method, the application does not reside in memory, does not consume the battery, does not displays uncomfortable notification icons!You run it only when you need!!You can add emoji that you like or you use most often in a favorite list!The application can be moved in the external memoryIf you like this application don't forget to write a good review and give 5 starsGive ALL the stars!!!Write ALL the reviews!!!Thanksâ(âµâ)â( âµ )â(ââµ)âSome emoji are not displayed correctly on all devices due to the version of Android installed on the device. I preferred not to remove them. reviews.title: Satisfied but could improve
reviews.comment: I really like the emoticons and the mass variety if it. It would be nice if you could add a notification that could be swiped away and a custom area so we can add emoticons you don\'t have. But really happy with it so far!
reviews.author: Jamie C.

reviews.title: I love it but
reviews.comment: Can you guys please make it to where we can click the emoticon once and it automatically copies? ( \342\211\247\320\224\342\211\246)
reviews.author: Gigi Victorio

reviews.title: Need some fixing.
reviews.comment: Would be much better if this could run in background, so we don\'t have to close then open again everytime we need the emoji. Also, there is no copy button in my HTC Desire HD. It becomes one with the share button, which makes it impractical. Please fix it!
reviews.author: Rahina Larasati

reviews.title: LG Optimus Slider
reviews.comment: Super great. Has a wide selection and cute faces.
reviews.author: Skye Johnston

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: So fun.... I so happy ...  Many auto text in here.. Thx :)
